Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze the Request Scenario Order-to-Cash process Standard Logic 1 Receive Order 2 Check Inventory 3 If Sufficient Authorize Payment Package Items Ship Order then Close Order 4 If Insufficient Cancel Order then Close Order Provided Model Process Tree Problem underfitting Pseudocode Analysis root children receive_order check_inventory xor_node close_order xor_node children successful_subtree cancel_subtree successful_subtree PARALLEL authorize_payment package_items ship_order cancel_subtree SEQUENCE cancel_order close_order Task Identify invalid trace permitted by model

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze the Process Tree Logic Root Sequence receive_order check_inventory xor_node close_order Implication Receive Order then Check Inventory then one XOR branch then Close Order XOR Branch 1 cancel_subtree Sequence cancel_order close_order Combined Receive Check Cancel Close Close Order Observation Close Order twice XOR Branch 2 successful_subtree Parallel authorize_payment package_items ship_order Implication any order Combined Receive Check Payment Package Ship any order Close Order

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Identify Domain Violations in Successful Path Standard Logic Authorize Payment then Package Items then Ship Order Model Parallel allows any interleaving Candidate Invalid Traces Trace A Receive Check Ship Authorize Payment Package Close Trace B Receive Check Package Authorize Payment Ship Close Trace C Receive Check Authorize Payment Ship Package Close

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Evaluate Candidates Trace C Ship before Package physically impossible cannot ship unpackaged items Trace B Package before Payment usually requires payment before fulfillment but Ship before Package stronger undeniable Trace A Ship before Payment Package worse

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Refining Selection most obvious Shipping before Packaging Trace Receive Order Check Inventory Ship Order Package Items Authorize Payment Close Order Model accepts Parallel any order like Ship Package Payment Domain No package before ship

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Considering Cancel branch Model Receive Check Cancel Close from branch Close from root Trace Receive Check Cancel Close Close Domain close once redundant invalid Comparison parallel classic underfitting example for logical flow prompt focuses successful path stick to Parallel

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Drafting Response Trace Receive Order Check Inventory Ship Order Package Items Authorize Payment Close Order Model Operator PARALLEL allows any permutation Domain Violation causality ship before package impossible payment before fulfillment violates prompt sequence Authorize Payment Package Items Ship Order Final Trace Choice Receive Order Check Inventory Ship Order Package Items Authorize Payment Close Order
